venue.name: The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.description:
Experience the combination of traditional West African Dance techniques with aerobic exercise.  Taught by my niece, Lovette, she will will bring you the ultimate African Dance Fitness work out experience while teaching you the culture and history behind the moves and grooves of this awesome session.

This is a 5 week Friday session that will run on Fridays, May 3, 10, 17, 24, 31, 2012.

The fee for the 5 week session is $25 and is non-refundable, and is due no later than the first day of the session.  The session is limited to 30 people.  Drop-Ins are allowed if space is available.  The drop in rate is $8 or 2 punches on your class card.

The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center, 56 Arbor St, Suite 103, Hartforf, CT 06106

(In the same building as Real Artways)

Bring water and a towel.  This class is taught barefoot.  Bring a lappa (piece of cloth to wrap around your hips)

Directions: I-84 West, Sission Avenue Exit, Take a left on Sission Ave. Take a left on Capitol Ave. The 3rd right is Arbor St.  It is in the same building as Real Artways.  Use the side green door entrance.  There is plenty of parking in the back.
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as The Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.name: "Its My Africa" Dance Fitness Session in Hartford
